p: I am informed by Police officer of St Louis that my boy Adam is in Confinement in your City. Will you do me the kindness to release him. Ship him to James Gamble of Louisville on some Southern or by Steamer, I suppose he has the money to pay the Expenses if he has not please pay it for me & the same shall be committed as soon as I am advised of the amount. I opted to Police officer G Doyle
That my agent would wait on him as soon as see him act as my agent in the premises once thereby very much oblige
